p: Using these criteria, we were able to collect 59 papers, in English, Portuguese and Spanish. As shown in Figure 2, most of the articles aimed to analyse the properties of the EOs of P. aduncum plants taken from the Amazon Rain Forest. We counted 39 from the Amazon, whereas only 8 were from the Atlantic Forest, and just 6 from both the Central America region (Cuba) and the Asian Tropics (Malaysia).
